review: I was given the generic equivalent of Valium prior to a closed MRI as I am claustrophobic.  It did not completely relax me during the protracted procedure, however, it did help to some degree.  I only took a 5mg dose; if I were to have to undergo this procedure in the future, I would take a 10mg dose.  One 5mg pill, however, does help me greatly when I experience bouts of insomnia.
Valium (diazepam):Valium helped relieve tension and anxiety prior to a endoscopic procedure and a colonoscopy. It caused no side-effects other then a slight amount of drowsiness.
